title: Transfer Between Accounts Request
description: This call allows transfers between accounts held by a given user. Fees structure: From fiat currency to cryptocurrency: 1% fee, From cryptocurrency to fiat currency: 0.5% fee, for an approved payment agent there is not fees for cryptocurrecncy to fiat only.

transfer_between_accounts.description: if account_from and account_to are not provided, we'll just return available accounts

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
